alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 5:03PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Ocean and eastern Monmouth Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Howell to near Toms River to Surf City. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Long Branch, Asbury Park, Lakewood, Middletown, Howell, Tinton Falls, Red Bank, Manasquan, Point Pleasant Beach, Seaside Heights, Farmingdale, Surf City, Mantoloking, Allenwood, Brick Township, Collingwood Park, Leisure Village, Dover Beaches North and Leisure Village East. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 27 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 86 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Ocean; Eastern Monmouth; Ocean; Western Monmouth
